text.en_US: A hedgehag with a pelt overgrown in moss, thorns, and roses. Said to be several times more durable than a typical hedgehag, the Hengehag takes a liking to living within ruins throughout the Autumn area. With a hide as hard as stone, the Hengehag's attacks hit harder than usual Hedgehag attacks, and it is also capable of spewing out seeds that burst forth in vines, making it a formidable Hedgehag to face.
